Here it is,

[spoiler]!http://img05.deviantart.net/d0e1/i/2015/195/6/7/the_squad__present_for_princess__by_number1croc-d91b5ls.png![/spoiler]

Also funny thing about this piece is it first was supposed to be a comic reference (Since you really like comics) aaand than it just sorta, kinda, turned into this. 

Hopefully next time I can do that. But I'm not sure which comic to do? Maybe Judge Dredd. 

Also also Hands are the bane of my existents! Why are you so hard!
